Name: Boulette Hell
About the game: Discover a world of epic battles in Boulette Hell, a brand-new boss-rush bullet hell! Be prepared to witness unique battles, each with their goofy dialogs, fun visuals, epic music and unique twists! Frantics battles Battle 14 epic bosses in this silly bullet hell! Don’t spend 30 hours cleaning corridors, go straight to each of our bosses! They are quirky, stupid, but reaaaally eager to fight! Meet a killing machine, a ninja or even a cat! Isn’t a cat just a ninja-killing-machine…? Play with 8 different characters Each character has unique skills and stories! May it be Eburnean, who doesn’t really know why he’s fighting all those bosses, Mantis the mantis, who has problems to communicate, or just the story of Bolt, who just want new friends (but will fails miserably, you don’t befriend bosses just like that). Handcrafted audiovisuals Every 2D art was made with love and hand-animated, each music was carefully selected for each boss to give them a unique experience, be sure you won’t forget any battle you have in Boulette Hell! Is the game too hard? Probably a bit, but don’t worry! We have an option to give you plenty of health! If you want to finish the game, you will finish the game! This game was made by twin brothers with love, we hope you like it!
